data.message: I have been hacked- how do I go about getting rid of this??  And no I do not know my password- How do I get that?

replies.message: Hi Pat. If you think someone has logged into your account without your permission, we recommend that you secure it right away. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2rA9NlW. Additionally, if you can't log into Facebook and need to reset your password, follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2s2aG7u. -Jessica
Thanks for reaching out, Rupa. If you've submitted the appeal to our team, please sit tight while we take the time to review it. We appreciate your patience. -Jessica

Dear facebook

reply!

Facebook  How Can I submit an Appeal if My Account is Suspended for unknown reason? I submitted identity information, including my ID and It is still locked out. At the same time Facebook send me E-MAIL messages that my account will be deleted if I do not update my page!!

It is a Catch22 I cannot login and update my account,, but at the same time you want me to login and update my page. I have this brand name account on various other social media platforms Google+, YouTube, Twitter, Tumblr and none of them has any problems or complaints. I have a website that I had links to from Facebook, I have hundreds of friends on Facebook with whom I cannot communicate. I spent a lot of time trying to comply with Facebook requests for identification yet, they are ignored. I am considering to write and article for the media to describe how hypocritical policies of Facebook and how they are poorly managed and enforced. I hope you will help me to resolve my problem. Please, respond to this account e-mail and I will provide more details.
